name: renative-community-plugins
description: A set of community plugins for Renative development

scripts.release:major: npm run lint && changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major
scripts.release:minor: npm run lint && changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor
scripts.release:patch: npm run lint && changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch
scripts.postversion: npm publish && git push origin && git push origin --tags

author: Wilson McCoubrey
